name: Cloud Boy
description:
Cloud Boy

Made for Ludumdare 45 compo 48 hr

Theme: Start with nothing

Tools
  • Engine: Godot
  • Art: Aseprite
  • Audio: Audacity, SFXR
  • Music: LMMS
Game

A platforming game where you start with no platforms!!!

You are cloud boy, and you have the juice to make your own clouds.

Use these clouds to make places for you to jump onto and complete levels

Challenge yourself by getting all the coins in each level, and using less juice
